Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Need to explore using "GO TEST", and produce XML output, for automation tools to work well. This would likely require modifying the structure of all GO OBCSDK app testcases, which are currently executed with "GO RUN" and produce logfiles in text format which must be examined for test results.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Since GO SDK is a tool that works only with v0.6, this is no longer needed.
